author: USA TODAY, Matthew Brown, USA TODAY
title: Fact check: 5G technology is not linked to coronavirus
description: Theories and allegations that the rollout of a new global technology standard is related to or caused COVID-19 are false.
content:
5G will be great, but you are probably going to need a new phone as we get ever-closer to a sci-fi-like future.
USA TODAY
The claim: 5G has been increasing and even causing the spread of coronavirus across the globe
Conspiracy theories that the novel coron… [+5955 chars]
